game.s_dis: Bloons Tower Defense 3 is a strategic 2D tower defense game where you place monkey towers to pop waves of bloons while upgrading towers and preventing them from reaching the end of the path.
game.l_dis:
Bloons Tower Defense 3 â€“ Upgrade, Strategize, and Pop!

Bloons Tower Defense 3 is the third installment in Ninja Kiwiâ€™s iconic tower defense series. Players strategically place various monkey towers along multiple tracks to pop incoming waves of balloons, called bloons, and prevent them from escaping.

What is Bloons Tower Defense 3?

This game expands on previous versions by introducing new tower types, upgrades, and bloon varieties. Players can also select different difficulty levels and enjoy multiple tracks, with a free play mode unlocked after completing levels.

How to Play Bloons Tower Defense 3?

  • Place Towers: Strategically position monkey towers to intercept bloons along the path.
  • Upgrade Towers: Enhance towers for greater popping power and special abilities.
  • Track Bloons: Watch each wave carefully to prevent bloons from reaching the exit.
  • Free Play Mode: Replay levels endlessly after initial completion.
  • Plan Your Strategy: Mix tower types and upgrades for optimal defense.

Why Play Bloons Tower Defense 3 Unblocked?

Bloons Tower Defense 3 Unblocked allows you to enjoy classic tower defense strategy anywhere online, at school, home, or work, with no downloads required.

Key Features

  • Multiple Tracks: Each level offers a different path for bloons.
  • Upgraded Towers: Enhanced abilities and special attacks for advanced strategy.
  • New Bloons: Introduces tougher and more diverse balloon types.
  • Free Play Mode: Replay levels to improve score and strategy.
  • Unblocked Access: Play instantly in your browser.

Can You Stop Every Bloon?
